attributes.action: Investigate factories in Leicester for modern day slavery
attributes.additional_details: There was only a short article in the news regarding modern day slavery in Leicester and that was it. This is a very serious matter, 100's and 1000's of individuals are suffering in silence. The situation will not reform unless the Government/Parliament take this seriously and step in.
attributes.background: Further investigate and bring justice to the thousands of individuals that are being used for modern day slavery in factories all around Leicester

rejection.details:
Taking action in relation to suspected breaches of the law are a matter for the police, Crown Prosecution Service and the courts, and not the Government or House of Commons.

If you have witnessed a crime you should report this to the police: https://www.met.police.uk/ro/report/ocr/af/how-to-report-a-crime/
